snippet: While such an appeal has been made before, it was unusual for the director of MI5, Britain’s domestic intelligence agency, to do it a live news interview, on BBC.
abstract: MI5 director Andrew Parker gives first live media interview in British intelligence agency's history; unprecedented appearance on BBC Radio repeated appeal to public for support on newer and broader antiterrorism measures.
lead_paragraph: While such an appeal has been made before, it was unusual for the director of MI5, Britain’s domestic intelligence agency, to do it a live news interview, on BBC.

headline.main: In First Live Interview, Britain’s MI5 Chief Seeks More Powers to Fight Terrorism
headline.print_headline: Breaking With Tradition, MI5 Chief Gives a Live Interview
